en.title: **Founding** Software Engineer
en.text:
Drove product innovation and B2B integrations in a fast-growing startup, collaborating with AI engineers to streamline cloud infrastructure and enhance the customer experience.

  • Spearheaded the development of high-quality projects, significantly contributing to securing funding for the company's next growth phase.
  • Collaborated with cross-functional teams, including AI engineers, to optimize cloud infrastructure and core algorithms, reducing AWS maintenance costs.
  • Developed and documented a reusable, easily integrable B2B module that enhanced the shopping experience for cosmetic customers and facilitated third-party shop store integration.
  • Collaborated with B2B customer development teams to seamlessly integrate AI analysis tools, working across diverse tech stacks including Shopify, Angular, and Vue.

en.title: **Senior** Software Engineer
en.text:
Led cross-functional teams in blockchain and IoT projects, championed test-driven development, and implemented SEO-optimized, headless CMS solutions to boost client success. Engineered fintech and AI-powered platforms in agile teams, integrated third-party services, and optimized microservice architecture to improve performance and scalability.

  • Led a team of four to develop a startup platform in the blockchain industry, achieving a significant increase in cryptocurrency value during my leadership.
  • Served as a core developer at an IoT startup targeting the European market, collaborating with diverse industry professionals and utilizing cloud services like Azure.
  • Employed a Test-Driven Development (TDD) approach, achieving 90% code coverage in tests using tools such as Cypress, Jest, and PHPUnit.
  • Led daily scrums involving client teams and mentored junior developers on best practices throughout the web development lifecycle.
  • Leveraged modern headless CMS solutions like Storyblok and optimized SEO, enhancing client satisfaction through reduced bounce rates and increased conversion rates, significantly boosting company revenue and success.
  • Developed a platform for a San Francisco-based fintech company specializing in precious metals and investment consultation, collaborating directly with the CTO.
  • Contributed to an AI-driven education platform for a Palo Alto-based K-12 startup, backed by angel investors, developing applications compatible with web browsers, mobile devices, and zSpace.
  • Collaborated actively with development teams and stakeholders in an agile environment, consistently meeting deadlines under high-pressure conditions.
  • Demonstrated expertise in integrating third-party APIs and services, including Stripe, Twilio, and Klaviyo, to enhance web application functionality.
  • Played a key role in the component design of a microservices architecture project, achieving a 20% reduction in latency.

en.title: Software Engineer
en.text:
Built scalable web applications and automation tools, including a Shopify marketing platform and CRM integrations, while embracing modern tech like GraphQL and microservices.

  • Developed a Shopify marketing platform leveraging industry-leading technologies such as GraphQL and Headless CMS.
  • Automated complex paperwork processes for a large furniture sales company, simplifying invoicing and PDF signatures, and integrated CRMs like HubSpot and Zendesk.
  • Actively engaged in Iteration Planning Meetings, translating business objectives into actionable deliverables across multiple projects.
  • Proactively monitored and adopted the latest industry trends and emerging technologies to drive innovation in projects.
  • Designed and implemented a microservice as a consumer of the main RESTful web server to enhance support for mobile application users.

en.title: Software Engineer
en.text:
Transformed design concepts into fully responsive web interfaces while improving code quality through TypeScript and collaborative Git workflows.

  • Leveraged TypeScriptâ€™s static type checking and advanced features, enhancing code quality and reducing bugs.
  • Proficient in using Git for version control, facilitating collaboration with cross-functional teams and maintaining code quality through rigorous code reviews.
  • Transformed Figma and Adobe XD designs into pixel-perfect, fully responsive interfaces using JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and CSS preprocessors.
